metadata.title: CVE-2022-24303 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
Pillow before 9.0.1 allows attackers to delete files because spaces intemporary pathnames are mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24303` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 9.2.0-1
python3-pil.imagetk - 9.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.2.0-1').
